WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
CANARY ISLANDS TO BARBADOS.
1. MAN OVERBOARD FROM 44 FOOT S/V VAGANT,
   WHITE HULL WITH BLUE STRIPE, TWO PERSONS ON
   BOARD, OVERDUE CANARY ISLANDS TO BARBADOS.
   LAST KNOWN POSITION IN VICINITY
   11-28.22N 057-41.36W ON 261206Z NOV.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO
   KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
   INMARSAT-C: 422799024, TELEX: 42912008,
   PHONE: 5965 9670 9292, FAX: 5965 9663 2450,
   E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3819/17.
